name: Mask Of The PostWar
description:
Mask Of  The PostWar

Its a Plataformer and Sigile Game completelly drawed in a 2D hand style way, the enemys detect you in a radio of lengh, changing its patrols, the player can decide its way to play, you win after defeating the lider of the guards you have been encounting in your way.

-The Game have been maded in my first year of course in the superiro school "ESI Murcia".

Created by: Gisela Albacete Martínez
